column1:
Hi. This is a placeholder for the instructions.


[Enter]

You can change the instructions by editing the csv file in the testdata map.
Make sure that you chose UTF-8 encoding when you save the file.
Not sure if Excel can do that, but LibreOffice or Notepad++ can!

[Enter]

To add extra pages,
just start a new section
enclosed by quotation marks.
[Yeehaa]

We don't have minimum or maximum presentation times for the instructions at the moment.

Let's look at the training now 

[OK]
